name: 吳昭正
objective: 布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
Week 1(9/12, 9/14). Introduction 
Week 2(9/19, 9/21). Number systems 
Week 3(9/26, 9/28). Boolean Algebra (I) 
Week 4(10/3, 10/5). Boolean Algebra (II) & Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (I)
Week 5(10/10, 10/12). Holiday; Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (II)
Week 6(10/17, 10/19). Karnaugh Maps (I)
Week 7(10/24, 10/26). Karnaugh Maps (II)
Week 8(10/31, 11/2). Quine-McClusky Method 
Week 9(11/7, 11/9). Midterm Exam
Week 10(11/14, 11/16). Multi-Level Gate Circuits NAND and NOR Gates
Week 11(11/21, 11/23). Combinational Circuit Design and Simulation Using Gates
Week 12(11/28, 11/30). Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (I)
Week 13(12/5, 12/7). Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (II)
Week 14(12/12, 12/14). Latches and Flip-Flops (I)
Week 15(12/19, 12/21). Latches and Flip-Flops (II)
Week 16(12/26, 12/28). Registers and Counters (I)
Week 17(1/2, 1/4). Registers and Counters (II)
Week 18(1/9, 1/11). Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework exams 30%
Midterm 30%
Final 30%
Attendance 10%
Class Participation 10%
materials: Fundamentals of Logic Design Enhanced, 7th Edition, by Charles H. Roth, Jr. , Larry L. Kinney , Eugene B. John, Pearson FT Press, 2020
